description: Deletes a service. A service can't be deleted if it's associated with a service network. If you delete a service, all resources related to the service, such as the resource policy, auth policy, listeners, listener rules, and access log subscriptions, are also deleted. For more information, see Delete a service in the Amazon VPC Lattice User Guide.

parameters.name: serviceIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID or ARN of the service.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status. You can retry the operation if the status is DELETE_FAILED. However, if you retry it while the status is DELETE_IN_PROGRESS, the status doesn't change.
